an3.127:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an3.127:1.2: Atha kho hatthako devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva:
an3.127:1.3: “bhagavato purato thassami”ti osidatimeva samsidatimeva, na sakkoti santhatum.
an3.127:1.4: Seyyathapi nama sappi va telam va valukaya asittam osidatimeva samsidatimeva, na santhati;
an3.127:1.6: “bhagavato purato thassami”ti osidatimeva samsidatimeva, na sakkoti santhatum.
an3.127:2.1: Atha kho bhagava hatthakam devaputtam etadavoca:
an3.127:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti, kho hatthako devaputto bhagavato patissutva olarikam attabhavam abhinimminitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
an3.127:2.4: Ekamantam thitam kho hatthakam devaputtam bhagava etadavoca:
an3.127:3.1: “Ye te, hatthaka, dhamma pubbe manussabhutassa pavattino ahesum, api nu te te dhamma etarahi pavattino”ti?
an3.127:3.2: “Ye ca me, bhante, dhamma pubbe manussabhutassa pavattino ahesum, te ca me dhamma etarahi pavattino;
an3.127:3.3: ye ca me, bhante, dhamma pubbe manussabhutassa nappavattino ahesum, te ca me dhamma etarahi pavattino.
an3.127:3.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, bhagava etarahi akinno viharati bhikkhuhi bhikkhunihi upasakehi upasikahi rajuhi rajamahamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasavakehi;
an3.127:3.5: evamevam kho aham, bhante, akinno viharami devaputtehi.
an3.127:3.6: Duratopi, bhante, devaputta agacchanti hatthakassa devaputtassa santike ‘dhammam sossama’ti.
an3.127:3.7: Tinnaham, bhante, dhammanam atitto appativano kalankato.
an3.127:3.9: Bhagavato aham, bhante, dassanassa atitto appativano kalankato;
an3.127:3.11: sanghassaham, bhante, upatthanassa atitto appativano kalankato.
an3.127:3.12: Imesam kho aham, bhante, tinnam dhammanam atitto appativano kalankatoti.
